revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DI-524 |revision=A2 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/12/2005 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Cameo |manuf_model=WLG-2206 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=KA2DI524A2 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88W8510 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV800BBTC-70 |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W986432DH-6 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8510 |wi1_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip2_model=88W8010 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:13:46 |oui_eth=00:13:46 }} {{SupportPage|vendor=D-Link|model=DI-524}}
This device is a '''Cameo''' WLG-2206 / '''Global Sun''' WL RT 2454 NM2. :[http://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/files/archive/djnetbsd_old/Marvell%20Libertas%20Wireless%20Routers.htm On djb's ''Marvell Libertas Wireless Routers'' page] (archived)
The FCC ID printed on the label is KA2DI524A2, but it has been :assigned the '''Cameo''' FCC ID (NHPWLG2206) in this entry.
The board is marked with "WL RT 2454 NM2 B10 VER:V1-0" in the FCC photos. <small> :TRENDnet TEW432BRP rev Bx.x version 1.2.0.0019 firmware works the best. :You will have to make some small edits to the firmware file in order to load. </small>
